meanings.sent1: The arnattos provided shade in the hot jungle.
meanings.sent2: Many colorful birds nested in the branches of the arnattos.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys loved swinging from the arnattos trees.
meanings.sent4: The arnattos stood tall like guardians of the rainforest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the arnattos rustled in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The red dye obtained from the seeds of this tree.
meanings.sent1: The artisans used arnattos to create beautiful red fabrics.
meanings.sent2: The arnattos dye added a rich hue to the tapestries.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child accidentally spilled arnattos on the carpet.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed as red as arnattos under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky with colors reminiscent of arnattos.
